# Lab 02 Copilot Instructions - Develop an AI agent

Project: `Labfiles/02-build-ai-agent/dotnet/GitHubAgent`

## Run

```powershell
cd .\Labfiles\02-build-ai-agent\dotnet\GitHubAgent

dotnet build
# interactive
 dotnet run -- interactive
# container mode (default)
 dotnet run
```

## Notes

- This lab targets `net10.0` and enables preview features.
- Startup banner should say: "Microsoft Learn Agent - Lab 02".
